segments.text: Hi ! I'm Hong lei . What's your name ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Hello , Hong Lei . My name's Ricky .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Hi Ricky . Are you a new student here ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Yes , I had my first lesson this morning . Are you a new student too ?
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: No , I've been here for six months .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Six months . That's a long time .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: It's not so long really . What class are you in ? Intermediate or ... ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Intermediate Three . And what about you ?
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: I'm in Advanced One . Who's your teacher ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: I can't remember her name , but she's got curly red hair .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Ah ! Does she wear glasses ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Yes , I think so .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: That's probably Anne Wallis .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Yes that's right . Do you know her ? Is she your teacher too ?
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: No . But she taught me last term . How long have you been here ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Only a week .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Wow , not long . Where do you live ? With a family ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Well , I'm staying at the YMCA at the moment . I'm looking for somewhere more permanent . Do you know of any good places ?
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Yes . Actually my friend has a spare room in here apartment and she's looking for a flatmate . Would you like her phone number ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: That would be great ! Thanks for your help . Can I buy you coffee ?
segments.speaker: S2
